attributes.action: Support the establishment of a museum of the horse for the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are the only European country that does not have an official museum of the horse. Such an oversight from a country of horse lovers needs to be corrected. We have extensive material here that requires archiving and valuable artifacts that should be valued that show our social/working/artistic history. This campaign has been launched to raise awareness of this oversight and to establish a museum of the horse.
